ComicInfo.Summary:
Be careful what you wish for. Julie and Ivy's desperate search for Cain brings them face to face with the crazed killer, but it appears they've been led straight into a trap. Meanwhile, Foster flips a switch and the Phi super-collider is activated!
Vijay copies work off his machine and then erases the data. He walks outside and panics when Dillon approaches he blurts out that everyone on Phi is being killed and he appears to fall between two parked cars. By the time Dillon runs around from one side of the car to the other there is no sign of Vijay.
Dillon rings Ivy and tells her he's lost Vijay and notes how high her voice is. She looks in the mirror a mole on her cheek she had removed at 19 has reappeared.
They arrive at the car park and help Dillon knock out the guards and then Julie gets a terrible sense of fear when smoke appears on the horizon.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 14:41:15. [CVDB232591]
ComicInfo.Characters: Dillon Murphy, Ivy M. Raven, Julie Martin
